topic.title: Document for Gaclib 1.0
topic.p: I am writing tutorials and API references for this project. I hope everything could be done at the end of this year.
Now both document page and code index are available. Introductions, tutorials, API references and examples are keep adding!
If you are interested in indexing C++ source code, please check out this repo, and these demo: Calculator, TypePrinter, STL.
